name: Pancakes
steps: Microwave Butter until half melted, swish around until fully liquid
Mix Sugar and an Egg's Yolk into the melted Butter
Put the Egg's White in an oversized bowl
Whisk the Egg White until foamy enough to leave stiff peaks
Add Buttermilk, Vanilla, Baking Powder, and Salt into the Butter
Mix the Flour into the mixture, Avoid over mixing - lumps are ok
Pour the mixture into the bowl with the whipped Egg White
Using a spoon to fold the whites into the mixture (don't overmix!)
Heat a pan on medium and spread butter on it
Once the butter just starts to brown, pour on batter
Once bubbles start appearing closer to the center, flip
Once cooked, take off pan and place on a grate
Put some Butter on top, let sit for a couple minutes before serving
